chapters.title: The Night Before Leaving
chapters.content: A small family was getting ready for one of humankind’s biggest voyages – a journey to a new frontier. A space telescope had recently found a habitable planet lightyears away; and it was up to this small family, plus a robotic crew, to set up camp. One of the kids, Stan, had to say goodbye to his parents and help pack up the ship. It was a somber evening and he struggled to get through it.
chapters.illustration: A balding middle-aged man and a woman in bright yellow pajamas embrace while a tall robotic figure in the background watches solemnly.

chapters.title: The Takeoff
chapters.content: The next morning, the family was joined by a team of engineers and scientists to witness their takeoff. The ship roared as it departed the launchpad, leaving a plume of smoke behind. Stan’s parents fought their tears before finally succumbing and bawling. Stan felt like his heart was breaking and his stomach churned as the ship rose higher and higher until it broke the atmosphere’s clutches.
chapters.illustration: A huge slab of metal rocketing up and up, with a family of two adults waving goodbye.

chapters.title: Running On Autopilot
chapters.content: With their mission staffed by a cutting-edge AI, the family's voyage was nearly effortless. Stan found himself living between cycles of monotonous routines, including sleep routines and hygiene routines; whatever could be automated, was. It became hard to tell when one sleep period ended and the next one began; was it the same time each day, or was Stan merely confused by the warp of space-time?
chapters.illustration: Four robotic figures wandering around in a glass nest, surrounded by a hazy flecked blanket of stars through the glass windows.

chapters.title: Arriving at the New Frontier
chapters.content: After what felt like an eternity (yet only a couple of days), the ship finally shuddered to a stop in front of the unknown planet. In a trance-like state, Stan followed along with the others as they made their way down the landing ramps and onto the strange new land. Despite the occasional bizarre sight, it felt much more like home than Stan had expected; intermixed between the harsh alien plants and animals were human-crafted wooden huts, complete with gardens and domestic animals. There was a sense of comfort, like finally arriving home.
chapters.illustration: A group of heavily-suited humans standing in wonder as they look around at the grassy fields, alien trees, and hut-like domiciles.

chapters.title: Setup of the New Home
chapters.content: Their arrival was the start of the biggest change in the course of human history; it took Stan days to really realize this, but finally the message began to sink in. For the first time in hundreds of years, humans caused a positive change in the universe, starting tribes, creating economies, building homes and thriving. Stan was in charge of creating gardens and animal solutions and he looked forward to the joyful life this new system would bring.
chapters.illustration: A boy in a worn astronaut suit standing among the tall grass with a metaphorical bird perched on his shoulder, a look of determination and content in his eye.

chapters.title: New Found Optimism
chapters.content: Now, as Stan went to bed, he was filled with optimism. He was no longer living his life day to day, but dreaming new and wondrous dreams. His future seemed brighter, more vibrant and full of surprises. He couldn't wait until the morning when he would rise up, strong and powerful to a fresh, new adventure.
chapters.illustration: A silhouette of a lone astronaut sleeping beneath a blanket of stars, a glowing smile of peace on his lips.

messages.name: BB
Alex
messages.content:
"""
story outline: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive

The story should be translated in Bulgarian
"""

messages.name: Assy
